title: WriteFileThen
extract: If lpOverlapped is NULL, the write operation starts at the current file position and WriteFile does not return until the operation is complete, and the system updates the file pointer before WriteFile returns. ... The system updates the OVERLAPPED offset before WriteFile returns.Dec 4, 2018
